summary: Picmonic provides students in higher education with a learning system of unforgettable visual mnemonic images and creative stories. The company is venture backed with over $5M invested, closing Series A funding in 2015. Student feedback and adoption has been incredible, leading Picmonic to be recognized as one of Arizona’s hottest startups, winning the 2014 Spring Arizona Innovation Challenge and Arizona's top 10 companies to work at in 2016.  At Picmonic, we move fast, take risks, and pride ourselves on staying flexible, fun, and ferociously committed to executing each day.___________________________________________________________________________Ken was integral to the 2011 founding of Picmonic as a key player in bringing in nearly $1 million in initial funding, from the original business plan to executing the initial development stage on time and under budget. Since Picmonic’s inception, Ken has run all internal operations, while also handling legal, finance, HR, etc. He is responsible for keeping Picmonic on track with the long-term vision through quarterly objectives, setting and driving the pace as he coordinates interdepartmental initiatives. Ken attended the United States Air Force Academy and holds a BS Supply Chain Management from Arizona State University. Previously with Northrop Grumman Space Technologies and General Dynamics C4 Systems, Ken brings extensive program management and operational experience to the Picmonic. ___________________________________________________________________________Finance, Fundraising, Capitalization, Digital Marketing, Lean Business, Design Thinking, Software Development, Mobile App Development, Product Management, Positioning, Go-to-Market, Strategic Marketing, Sales, Marketing Automation, Corporate Development, Technology Partnerships, Venture-backed, Education, EdTech, Venture Capital firm, Early-stage, Cloud-based, New Market Development, User Experience, UI/UX, Design, Rapid Prototyping, LAMP, Angular, Swift
